abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Loan will
            support Government's structural adjustment program by
            addressing selected areas of policy that are key to growth.
            The program aims at raising the efficiency of public sector
            management, removing the allocative inefficiencies produced
            by the prevailing restrictive trade regime, and providing
            the social underpinnings for the sustainability of the
            adjustment process. Specifically, the loan will support a
            reform program encompassing: (a) public sector resource
            mobilization and allocation which includes state enterprise
            restructuring and divestiture, efficiency improvements and
            tariff increases in the public utilities, and strengthening
            the management of public sector investment; (b) improving
            the incentive framework, particularly the trade regime and
            investment incentives; and (c) strengthening the
            Government's social sector policies and programs,
            including ameliorating the social impact of the adjustment
            and maintaining an adequate social safety net.
